title: Understanding Data Tables
text: A data table is a range of cells that shows how changing one or two variables in your formulas will affect the results of those formulas.

title: Locating the Data Table Option
text: The data table option is found under the 'What-If Analysis' tool in Excel.

hintAnswer: select the range, click $$"what-if$$ analysis" (data|forecast) and click data table
title: Steps to Define a Data Table
text: To define a range as a data table, you need to follow a series of steps in Excel.
choices: >select the range, click "data" and click "data table"
>select the range, click "insert" and click "data table"
